summary: FRONT PASSENGER DOOR OPEN LIGHT WILL REMAIN ON, DESPITE BEING SECURED CLOSED CAUSING INTERIOR LIGHTS TO REMAIN ON UNTIL 10 MPH. THIS IS A PROBLEM WHEN REVERSING AT NIGHT. WE DON'T REVERSE ABOVE 10MPH AND IT IS DIFFICULT TO SEE. IT IS ALSO A PROBLEM DRIVING IN TRAFFIC AT NIGHT. WE ALSO WORRY THE LIGHT WILL DRAIN OUR BATTERY.
